attrs.name: text-color
attrs.desc: Text color when the radio is activated in button mode
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is #fff

attrs.name: disabled
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: size
attrs.desc: Size of an option button group. This parameter is valid only for radios with buttons or borders. The optional values of this attribute are medium / small / mini

attrs.name: fill
attrs.desc: Fill color and border color when the radio in button mode is activated

attrs.name: vertical
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

events.name: change
events.desc: Event triggered when the binding value changes
